head.title: About Us - Ochoa - International Product Development, Design and Production
head.description: Developing systems to automate simple and complicated industrial processes. Contact us to know more.

block1.heading: About us
block1.i1: Hi there, we are the Ochoa's, A family of engineers, immigrants starting a business in the United States, chasing the American Dream, opportunity for prosperity and success.
block1.i2: Ochoa offers Agile Automation services and  provides end-to-end solutions for product development, design and manufacturing through our experts and professionals.

block2.heading: Why us
block2.i1: Developing and Manufacturing becomes complex with scale. And many costly mistakes are taken through the path.
block2.i2: Chosing our profesional experience makes your project faster and more cost efficient.
block2.i3: We develop Scalable technology and Your ability scale directly affects if and how your business grows.
block2.i4: With our experience making software we have to see it from the point of the investors, what do they want done what are the technologies resources needed , what are the better alternatives for functionality. and how can we build a team around the idea making it a cost effective product without overspending on overthinking and over engineering.
block2.i5: Upgrading environments merging teams and organizing large technological issues is a nightmare and if you're knowledge on technology is not that big that's why we are here.
